abstract: AT&T could pay up to $29.1 billion, or $65 a share for EchoStar Communications, Citigroup analyst Jason Bazinet wrote in a research report Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: AT&T could pay up to $29.1 billion, or $65 a share for EchoStar Communications, Citigroup analyst Jason Bazinet wrote in a research report Tuesday.

headline.main: AT&T Could Pay $29 Billion for EchoStar, Analyst Says
